analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CommonSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#442-469):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#455)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#455-456)
	External calls sending eth:
	- multisigWallet.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#450-451)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stages (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#465)
	- stages (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#469)
	- totalInvested (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#461-465)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol:
	Contract QBEToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#325-329)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

CommonSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#442-469) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#455)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#455-456)

CommonSale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#470-481) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(multisigWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#476-481)

Presale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#505-509) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(multisigWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc029ba3dc12e1834571e821d94a07de0a01138ea.sol#509)
